import { asClass } from 'awilix';
import {
  {{EntityName}}sService,
  Get{{EntityName}}s,
  Get{{EntityName}},
  Register{{EntityName}},
  Delete{{EntityName}},
  Update{{EntityName}},
} from './Application';
import {
  {{EntityName}}sController,
  {{EntityName}}sRepositoryImplementation,
} from './Infrastructure';
import { container } from '@server/utils/Container';

export const {{entityName}}App = {
  {{entityName}}sRepository: asClass({{EntityName}}sRepositoryImplementation),
  {{entityName}}sService: asClass({{EntityName}}sService),
  {{entityName}}sController: asClass({{EntityName}}sController),
  _get{{EntityName}}s: asClass(Get{{EntityName}}s),
  _get{{EntityName}}: asClass(Get{{EntityName}}),
  _register{{EntityName}}: asClass(Register{{EntityName}}),
  _delete{{EntityName}}: asClass(Delete{{EntityName}}),
  _update{{EntityName}}: asClass(Update{{EntityName}}),
};

export const {{entityName}}sController = () =>
  container.resolve<{{EntityName}}sController>('{{entityName}}sController');
